user.title: Home Assistant VSCode Tunnel
user.description:
If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/adechant/ha_vscode.
1. Open {url} 
2. Paste the token listed below to authorize your VSCode tunnel.
3. Click submit to activate the tunnel. 
```
{token}
```

progress.wait_for_oauth: Generating OAuth token. Please wait while the tunnel is started.
